channel.title: Help whit compile
channel.description: Hi, i made a server, i portforwarded and i did all that thigs, now on client i compiled, but on source when i try to compile this tell me i cant compile because i dont have jdk 5 or 6... and i download it and installed it... why i cant compile on source? the client.java please help.

item.title: Help whit compile
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

I know what compiler you have… Try this one:

@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Help whit compile
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

you need to change the JDK number inside the ‘Compile.bat’
